short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of furniture in Alberta.
full_summary:
**Office Furniture Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-279-71618131
**Solicitation Number:** 3000778316
**Publication Date:** 2024-02-27
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-07T13:00:00

**Tender Details**
---------------

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** None applicable

**Scope of Work**
----------------

Veterans Affairs Canada requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture in Alberta by Mid-June 2024. This procurement is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following product categories:

* Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
* Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products
* Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets
* Ancillary and Lighting Products
* Collaborative Furniture

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Contact Name:** Lynn Paulin
* **Email:** lynn.paulin@veterans.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (782) 377-4105

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

The tender package, including the notice of proposed procurement (NPP) and amendment package (APM), is available for download from the following URLs:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32906/3000778316---npp.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32906/3000778316---apm.pdf

**Important Dates**
------------------

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-07T13:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-06-03
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-08-30

Note to bidders: Please ensure you meet the eligibility criteria and follow the instructions outlined in the tender package. Only proposals submitted through the CanadabuyService tendering system will be considered.  #officefurniture #governmenttender #domesticprocurement 
```

Please make the corrections, rephrase, and upgrade the text as requested.
